model.skill_type



enum SkillType: byte;
Skill type. In some game modes a wizard can not learn skills (see 
game.skillsEnabled
).
There is three skill groups: active, passive and auras.
  • Active skills provide an ability to perform a new action, not available before.
  • Passive skills are constantly improving some characteristic of the wizard for a certain value.
  • Auras are constantly improving some characteristic of the wizard and all friendly wizards in the 
    game.auraSkillRange
    .


unknown
Default value.

rangeBonusPassive1
Passive skill. Increases cast range by 
game.rangeBonusPerSkillLevel
.

rangeBonusAura1
Aura. Increases cast range by 
game.rangeBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
rangeBonusPassive1
.

rangeBonusPassive2
Passive skill. Increases cast range by 
2.0 * game.rangeBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
rangeBonusAura1
.

rangeBonusAura2
Aura. Increases cast range by 
2.0 * game.rangeBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
rangeBonusPassive2
.

advancedMagicMissile
Passive skill. Removes the 
magicMissile
spell delay. The common action delay 
game.wizardActionCooldownTicks
still applies.
Requires 
rangeBonusAura2
.

magicalDamageBonusPassive1
Passive skill. Increases instant magical damage by 
game.magicalDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.

magicalDamageBonusAura1
Aura. Increases instant magical damage by 
game.magicalDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
magicalDamageBonusPassive1
.

magicalDamageBonusPassive2
Passive skill. Increases instant magical damage by 
2.0 * game.magicalDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
magicalDamageBonusAura1
.

magicalDamageBonusAura2
Aura. Increases instant magical damage by 
2.0 * game.magicalDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
magicalDamageBonusPassive2
.

frostBolt
Active skill. A wizard can now use the 
frostBolt
spell.
Requires 
magicalDamageBonusAura2
.

staffDamageBonusPassive1
Passive skill. Increases staff damage by 
game.staffDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.

staffDamageBonusAura1
Aura. Increases staff damage by 
game.staffDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
staffDamageBonusPassive1
.

staffDamageBonusPassive2
Passive skill. Increases staff damage by 
2.0 * game.staffDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
staffDamageBonusAura1
.

staffDamageBonusAura2
Aura. Increases staff damage by 
2.0 * game.staffDamageBonusPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
staffDamageBonusPassive2
.

fireball
Active skill. A wizard can now use the 
fireball
spell.
Requires 
staffDamageBonusAura2
.

movementBonusFactorPassive1
Passive skill. Increases movement speed by 
1.0 + game.movementBonusFactorPerSkillLevel
times.
Summarily 
movementBonusFactorPassive2
and 
movementBonusFactorAura2
increase movement speed by 
1.0 + 4.0 * game.movementBonusFactorPerSkillLevel
times.

movementBonusFactorAura1
Aura. Increases movement speed by 
1.0 + game.movementBonusFactorPerSkillLevel
times.
Requires 
movementBonusFactorPassive1
.

movementBonusFactorPassive2
Passive skill. Increases movement speed by 
1.0 + 2.0 * game.movementBonusFactorPerSkillLevel
times.
Requires 
movementBonusFactorAura1
.

movementBonusFactorAura2
Aura. Increases movement speed by 
1.0 + 2.0 * game.movementBonusFactorPerSkillLevel
times.
Requires 
movementBonusFactorPassive2
.

haste
Active skill. A wizard can now use the 
haste
spell.
Requires 
movementBonusFactorAura2
.

magicalDamageAbsorptionPassive1
Passive skill. Decreases received magical damage by 
game.magicalDamageAbsorptionPerSkillLevel
.

magicalDamageAbsorptionAura1
Aura. Decreases received magical damage by 
game.magicalDamageAbsorptionPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
magicalDamageAbsorptionPassive1
.

magicalDamageAbsorptionPassive2
Passive skill. Decreases received magical damage by 
2.0 * game.magicalDamageAbsorptionPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
magicalDamageAbsorptionAura1
.

magicalDamageAbsorptionAura2
Aura. Decreases received magical damage by 
2.0 * game.magicalDamageAbsorptionPerSkillLevel
.
Requires 
magicalDamageAbsorptionPassive2
.

shield
Active skill. A wizard can now use the 
shield
spell.
Requires 
magicalDamageAbsorptionAura2
.
